workshoptitle: Set up live data sharing between Oracle Databases using Cloud Links and PL/SQL APIs

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up the Workshop Environment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your workshop environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a Share Provider User
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a share provider user.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create, Populate, and Publish a Data Share
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to load local data into your ADW instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create and Authorize the Data Share Recipient
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to load local data into your ADW instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Consume the Data Share
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to load local data into your ADW instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Clean up Resources Used in the Workshop (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
